title: Stylish Luxury 4 Bed Luxury Designer Villa in Bangpor
description:
Key Features
•	4 bedroom luxury sea-view pool villas 
•	Prime location in peak Angthong Hills
•	Secure & exclusive gated community
•	Spectacular panoramic ocean-views
•	Private infinity-edge swimming pool
•	Fully furnished & 'turn-key' handover 
•	Chic interiors with light & earthy tones
•	Featured local stone walls & details 
•	High-quality furnishing & decoration 
•	Designer fully-equipped kitchen
•	Oversized ceilings in living areas
•	Fully extendable glass sliding doors
•	Private covered parking area 
•	24/7 security & gated entry
•	Landscaped tropical gardens
•	Built area: 1300 sq.m 
•	Land sizes: 1980-2244 sq.m 
•	Freehold tenure
